messages.message: Should we consider blocking non ib emails on dev and uat? I was able to oauth with my personal gmail
It may be worth considering pre-launch to close this off, but it will still be open for unauth users. @Yan Wang, is there an easy way to block personal emails for now?
The reason even on prod is i can see our latest certs on crt.sh and can see we have a new ai-x space that i could hit

> It may be worth considering pre-launch to close this off, but it will still be open for unauth users. @Yan Wang, is there an easy way to block personal emails for now?
We cannot do that on the google side. But one way is to check the email domain and only allow `@instabase.com`  from the webapp.
Makes sense, is it high lift to do this on the IB side?

>  is it high lift to do this on the IB side?
It's not too much work. But is this urgent?
It'll be good to do sooner since we risk external users signing up now unless we close this gap. Post launch (~May 31), this will not be relevant anyways and we'll need to remove this
I can upload a pr today. But I feel like we can keep this for dev/uat envs because I don't think we need external users to visit these two envs.
Agreed, we only need to remove it in Prod on launch :slightly_smiling_face:

Hey Yan - just wanted to check if this PR has landed? I was looking at usage for the AIHub prod env and it looks like a few users have signup up with personal email addresses already :eyes: cc: @Varun Jain @Clemens FYI

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dC0nJ1oYrPCbbpFDeJN5P15Vma9R24FILkiltdysurc/edit?usp=sharing
The pr is ready https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/41157, waiting for approval from `SAAS-Sheperds`
Is there someone from that group that we can tag to take a look at this more urgently?
Hi @Aaron Tami  sorry to bother you this late. Could you please take a look at this pr (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/41157)? Thanks

Let me know if there is someone IST based too, I can reach out to them and ask them to review :slightly_smiling_face: FWIW, we can wait for tomorrow too but should try to lock this down sooner v/s later.
Hey yes I can take a look
